item.title:
Katy Perry tells @BuzzFeedCeleb she wants Lizzo to join ‘American Idol’ as a judge:
“This is an invitation from me, Katy Perry. Lizzo, I'm asking you to join the panel. I'm feeling a little outnumbered on the testosterone. I could really use some bold, honest, hot takes.”
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Taylor Swift breaks the record for the most weeks spent in the Billboard 200 top 10 among women (278 weeks).
item.author: popcrave

item.title: ‘One Thing At A Time’ by Morgan Wallen becomes the longest-running #1 country album on the Billboard 200 since Taylor Swift’s ‘Fearless’ in 2008/9 (11 weeks).
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
Taylor Swift charts two albums in the top 10 on the Billboard 200 this week:
#2: Midnights #10: Lover
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
‘Random Access Memories’ by Daft Punk returns to the Billboard 200 at #8 with 40,000 units (32,000 pure sales), following its 10th anniversary.
It debuted at #1 in 2013.
item.author: popcrave
